tasks.coref.i2b2

Class I2B2CoreferencePipeline

  • java.lang.Object
    • tasks.coref.i2b2.I2B2CoreferencePipeline

  • public class I2B2CoreferencePipeline
extends java.lang.Object
    The pipeline to resolve coreference in i2b2/VA coreference corpus.

    This class focuses on Task 1C of 2011 i2b2 challenge. No specific mention detection step is performed, but the existing gold markables are preprocessed to detect their fine-grained type to be used by the pipeline. Two types of coreference are handled: CoreferenceType.Anaphora and CoreferenceType.Appositive.

    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

      • domainSpecificPreProcessing

        public static void domainSpecificPreProcessing(Document doc,
                                               SectionSegmenter segmenter)
        Task-specific preprocessing step, in which document is segmented into sections.

        The section segmenter to use is provided as an input parameter.

        Parameters:
        doc - the document to process
        segmenter - the section segmenter to use

      • coreferenceResolution

        public static void coreferenceResolution(Document doc)
        Resolves coreference in a single i2b2/VA document.

        It processes the gold markables to identify their fine-grained mention types and identifies coreference relations between them. For the i2b2/VA corpus, relations considered are anaphora and appositive relations.

        Parameters:
        doc - the document to process

      • mentionReferentLinking

        public static void mentionReferentLinking(Document doc)
        Links coreferential mentions to their referents and generates CoreferenceChain objects.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document to process

      • generateCoreferenceChain

        public static void generateCoreferenceChain(Document doc,
                                            SurfaceElementChain chain)
        Adds a CoreferenceChain object to the document, given the textual units involved in it. It performs consistency checks, merges mentions into other coreference chains, and handles chains involving coordinated items.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document being processed
        chain - the chain of textual units

      • postProcessing

        public static void postProcessing(Document doc)
        Post-processes the generated coreference chains for consistency and relevance.

        This method merges coreference chains extracted at the section level into existing chain, based on ExactStringAgreement constraint. All singleton mentions with the text patient are clustered with the existing patient chain. Clusters with second person singular (you etc.) are also merged with the patient chain. All remaining singletons are discarded.

        Parameters:
        doc - the document to process

      • init

        public static void init()
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.lang.InstantiationException,
                        java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Reads properties from coref_i2b2.properties file and initializes WordNet, resolution strategies and coreference-related word lists. It also performs section segmentation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the section segmenter class cannot be found
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if the section segmenter cannot be accessed
        java.lang.InstantiationException - if the section segmenter cannot be initialized
        java.io.IOException - if properties file cannot be found
